item.title: Technology and Literacy: Two Perspectives on a System
item.description: I would like to start back at the beginning Notecard Front The front of the notecard with definitions from the first day of class. The questions that guided each entery are: What does it mean to be literate? and Why and/or how is this important? Notecard Back These represent changing in my earlier definitions as prompted during different points in the semester.
